title: Victoria Beckham’s Exact 2025 Morning Routine: $2,000 Skincare, Ice Plunge & 7am Workout
shortdescription: VB just shared her updated hour-by-hour ritual for glowing skin and abs at 51.
author: Jane Doe

content.content: Victoria Beckham just revealed her updated 2025 morning routine — and it’s as disciplined as ever. Wake up at 5:30, 10-step skincare with her own VB line ($2,000+ worth of product), 7-minute lymphatic drainage massage, ice plunge, then straight to the gym by 7am for 45 minutes of incline treadmill + weights.
Breakfast? Green juice + avocado on gluten-free toast. She says this routine keeps her looking “better at 51 than I did at 31.”
